Sudoku Algorithm Module

class sudoku_algorithm.SudokuAlgorithm(board)[source]

Handles the solving process of the sudoku board via a backtracking algorithm. This class converts an unsovled 2D list to a solved 2D list

check_possible_indicies(x, y, n)[source]

Checks if a certain indicies is possible on a certain grid of the sudoku board

Parameters:

  • x (int) – Column number of the sudoku board.

  • y (int) – Row number of the sudoku board.

  • n (int) – Number to check in the grid square.

Returns:

True if number is allowed, False otherwise

Return type:

bool

find_mrv_cell()[source]

Finds the cells with the minimum remaining values (MRV) and returns the cell with the least amount of possible values

Returns:

The x and y coordinate of the cell with the least amount of possible values or None if no cell exists

Return type:

tuple

solve_sudoku()[source]

Solves the sudoku by recurssion of possbile indicies this function utlises the backtracking algorithm

Returns:

True if the board is solved, False otherwise

Return type:

bool
